Detailed Description

HTML drop-down list class.

This class is used to generate HTML drop-down lists.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
Copyright:
2009 David Singer
Author:
David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
1.7.0
Todo:

Add support for selecting multiple items.

Fix issues with htmlentities.

Boo_Html_Select::addDefault ( $  key  ) 

Adds key to list of default items.

This feature is not yet implemented! Added for future API compatibility.

Parameters:
string $key The default key.
Returns:
bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.
Todo:
Finish this function when updating class to support multiple selects.

Boo_Html_Select::getDefaultIndex (  ) 

Gets the default index.

* Zero based.

Warning:
This function relies on the internal order of the data array. This can be dangerous.
Returns:
mixed Returns default index on success, FALSE on failure.

Member Data Documentation

Boo_Html_Select::$data = array() [protected]

The select elements data.

Implemented as an array where the key is the option value and the value is the text displayed.

Definition at line 25 of file Select.php.

Boo_Html_Select::$default = '' [protected]

The default key.

Overided by posted values or selected key.

Definition at line 39 of file Select.php.

Boo_Html_Select::$selected = '' [protected]

The selected key.

Overrides posted value and default key.

Definition at line 46 of file Select.php.

Referenced by html().

Boo_Html_Select::$title = array('name' => '', 'value' => '') [protected]

The title of the select element.

Will be displayed as the first item in the select list if set and will contain a value of an empty string by default.
